title: Approximate Q-Learning

definitions.Approximate Q-Learning: A type of reinforcement learning algorithm that estimates the value of each state-action pair.

formulas: Q(s, a) = \sum_{s', r, d} P(s', r, d | s, a) [r + \gamma \max_{a'} Q(s', a')]
summary: The slide presents the concept of Approximate Q-Learning, a reinforcement learning algorithm that estimates the value of each state-action pair. It includes a formula for the Q-value calculation.
